title: Kansas City Confidential (restored, with intro and outro) (1952, film noir, imdb score: 7.3)

sources.title: Kansas City Confidential (restored, with intro and outro) (1952, film noir, imdb score: 7.3)
sources.description: Kansas City Confidential is a 1952 American independently-made film noir and crime film directed by Phil Karlson starring John Payne and Coleen Gray . The film was released in the United Kingdom as The Secret Four . Karlson and Payne teamed a year later for 99 River Street , another film noir, followed by Hell's Island , a film noir in color. This film is now in the public domain .
